heading: HR01754
0: A RESOLUTION DIRECTING THE COMMITTEE ON AGRICULTURE AND FOOD TO CONDUCT AN INQUIRY, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, ON THE LACK OF GOVERNMENT INTERVENTION ON THE WORSENING CROP INFESTATION IN SEVERAL PARTS OF EASTERN VISAYAS, AND RECOMMEND MEASURES THAT WILL ADDRESS THE SITUATION OF THE AFFECTED PEASANT FAMILIES

history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR01754
FULL TITLE : A RESOLUTION DIRECTING THE COMMITTEE ON AGRICULTURE AND FOOD TO CONDUCT AN INQUIRY, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, ON THE LACK OF GOVERNMENT INTERVENTION ON THE WORSENING CROP INFESTATION IN SEVERAL PARTS OF EASTERN VISAYAS, AND RECOMMEND MEASURES THAT WILL ADDRESS THE SITUATION OF THE AFFECTED PEASANT FAMILIES
